name: Herby
description:
In Herby the titular character needs to be guided through a maze that consists of more than 100 single-screen rooms, connected horizontally and vertically, to find the exit. He starts with five lives and needs to avoid hazards and enemies, while solving a number of puzzles. He can be moved around freely in eight directions using a joystick. The screen shows the total score, remaining number of lives, the room number, the percentage of the game that has been solved, and the amount of keys he carries.

Typical hazards are barriers that disappear briefly, moving enemies and moving blocks. A single collision is immediately deadly. Puzzles involve keys to open doors and items that need to be picked up. Some items have an effect right away, while others only reveal their purpose later on.

shot.caption: Encountering some deadly barriers that appear and disappear, so the timing has to be good!
There are some blocks here now. (the walls are deadly too)
Oops. Lost one of Herby's lives, because I could not dodge the block!
There is an item to be found here. What will it do?
Total darkness! Now I cannot see where the walls are.
Because of the Darkness I lost a life, but I got to the next room and there is a creature here.
Now the timing has to be perfect to dodge the barrier AND you need to pass through a small passage.
Beware of the big blocks that are moving around.
There is also a key in the corner that will open one of the doors that you can find in some of the rooms.
Now does THAT look familiar? Yes...That is the logo of Radarsoft!
